query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: Toolbox for the design and simulation of Large PV pumping systems
result.description: Open-source design and simulation toolbox for Large PV pumping irrigation systems allowing the estimation of its productivity and profitability. The toolbox will be available in the project website for free use but it will be possible to download the open-source code.

result.title: Document with possibilities and means to favour gender equality in the sector of PV pumping irrigation
result.description: Document about possibilities and means to favour gender equality in the sector of PV pumping irrigation, not only in Europe but also in the North of Africa. The document will analyse the rol of women in the world of irrigation and, in particular, in irrigation with PV and will propose measures to favour gender equality in this sector.

result.title: Three visits to each of the first market application systems
result.description: These visits will be focused on the following targets: - one visit focused on the technicians and decision-makers of the potential end-users. - one visit for the representatives of the public administration, associations and general public organizations. - one visit for potential investors, business angels and representatives of banks. This deliverable will report about the content of the technical visits and their impact in terms of number of representatives of the targeted collectives reached.
